query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Nel mezzo del cammin di nostra vita 2 mi ritrovai per una selva oscura, 3 ché la diritta via era smarrita.
query.error: **English:** 1 In the middle of the journey of our life 2 I found myself in a dark wood, 3 because the straight way was lost.
query.result: 1 Di tengah-tengah perjalanan hidup kita 2 aku menemukan diriku di dalam hutan yang gelap, 3 karena jalan yang lurus telah hilang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Ahi quanto a dir qual era è cosa dura 5 esta selva selvaggia e aspra e forte 6 che nel pensier rinova la paura!
query.error: **English:** 4 Ah, how hard it is to tell what it was like, 5 this wild, rough, and strong forest 6 that renews fear in my thoughts!
query.result: 4 Ah, betapa susahnya untuk menceritakan bagaimana keadaannya, 5 hutan yang liar, kasar, dan kuat ini 6 yang memperbarui rasa takut dalam pikiranku!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Tant’ è amara che poco è più morte; 8 ma per trattar del ben ch’i’ vi trovai, 9 dirò de l’altre cose ch’i’ v’ho scorte.
query.error: **English:** 7 It is so bitter that death is little more so; 8 but to treat of the good that I found there, 9 I will tell of the other things that I perceived there.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Io non so ben ridir com’ i’ v’intrai, 11 tant’ era pien di sonno a quel punto 12 che la verace via abbandonai.
query.error: **English:** 10 I do not know well how I entered it, 11 so full of sleep was I at that moment 12 that I abandoned the true way.
query.result: 10 Aku tidak tahu bagaimana aku bisa masuk ke dalamnya, 11 begitu lelapnya aku saat itu 12 sehingga aku meninggalkan jalan yang benar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Ma poi ch’i’ fui al piè d’un colle giunto, 14 là dove terminava quella valle 15 che m’avea di paura il cor compunto,
query.error: **English:** 13 But after I arrived at the foot of a hill, 14 where that valley ended 15 which had filled my heart with fear,
query.result: 13 Tetapi setelah aku sampai di kaki sebuah bukit, 14 di tempat lembah itu berakhir 15 yang telah memenuhi hatiku dengan ketakutan,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 guardai in alto e vidi le sue spalle 17 vestite già de’ raggi del pianeta 18 che mena dritto altrui per ogne calle.
query.error: **English:** 16 I looked up and saw its shoulders 17 already clothed with the rays of the planet 18 that leads one straight on every path.
query.result: 16 aku melihat ke atas dan melihat bahunya 17 sudah tertutup oleh sinar-sinar planet 18 yang menuntun seseorang dengan lurus di setiap jalan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Allor fu la paura un poco queta, 20 che nel lago del cor m’era durata 21 la notte ch’i’ passai con tanta pieta.
query.error: **English:** 19 Then the fear was somewhat quieted, 20 which had lasted in the lake of my heart 21 the night that I passed with so much pity.
query.result: 19 Ketika itu rasa takut agak reda, 20 yang telah berlangsung di lubuk hatiku 21 malam ketika aku lalui dengan begitu banyak belas kasihan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 E come quei che con lena affannata, 23 uscito fuor del pelago a la riva, 24 si volge a l’acqua perigliosa e guata,
query.error: **English:** 22 And like one who with weary breath, 23 having emerged from the sea to the shore, 24 turns to the perilous water and gazes,
query.result: 22 Dan seperti orang yang dengan napas lelah, 23 setelah keluar dari laut ke pantai, 24 menoleh ke air yang berbahaya dan menatap,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 così l’animo mio, ch’ancor fuggiva, 26 si volse a retro a rimirar lo passo 27 che non lasciò già mai persona viva.
query.error: **English:** 25 so my soul, which still fled, 26 turned back to look again at the pass 27 which had never let a living person escape.
query.result: 25 begitulah jiwaku, yang masih melarikan diri, 26 menoleh ke belakang untuk melihat lagi jalan 27 yang belum pernah membiarkan orang hidup melarikan diri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 Poi ch’èi posato un poco il corpo lasso, 29 ripresi via per la piaggia diserta, 30 sì che ’l piè fermo sempre era ’l più basso.
query.error: **English:** 28 After I had rested my weary body a little, 29 I resumed my journey along the deserted slope, 30 so that the foot that was always lower was the firm one.
query.result: 28 Setelah aku mengistirahatkan tubuhku yang lelah sejenak, 29 aku melanjutkan perjalanan melalui lereng yang sunyi, 30 sehingga kaki yang selalu lebih rendah adalah yang kokoh.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
